name: Nokia Qt LGPL Exception v1.0
text:
As a special exception to the GNU Lesser General Public License version 2.1, the
object code form of a "work that uses the Library" may incorporate material from
a header file that is part of the Library.  You may distribute such object code
under terms of your choice, provided that the incorporated material (i) does not
exceed more than 5% of the total size of the Library; and (ii) is limited to
numerical parameters, data structure layouts, accessors, macros, inline
functions and templates.
